availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Brown (Morgan County, Kentucky, merchant and soldier.)

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, merchant and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Brown. Father of John C. Brown. Merchant in Morgan County in 1860. Captain in the 45th Mounted Kentucky Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) from December 1863 to February 1864. Lieutenant colonel of the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia (U.S.A.) from May 21, 1864, to June 21, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0496.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, District 1, p. 53.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 894.
